name: N.E.O.N. THE GAME
description:
Do you like cubic forms? Do you like neon? do you like family friendly non violently murdering cute creatures? This is your fucking game then

Hop in neon with your family, friens or significant other. Fight, compete, win and end up disinherited, alone and single!

To download it just do the usual, decompress it and it's right there, usual unity stuff i am sure you have danced to this tune before. But not with neon lights!

This is a Uni project, we are group 13, "Azy's box of plasas" with the names:

  • J. Miguel Arranz - @Hiimbox - (Programming, Design, Artist)
  • Pol Plaza Roca - @Poru_kun99 - (Level Design, Localization, Artist)
  • S. Cebotari - @CbSandu  - (Design, Sounds, Artist)

PRACTICE MODE CONTROLS:

AD - Horizontal Movement

Q - Fire

Space, W - Jump

S - Hide

LOCAL MULTIPLAYER (PLAY): 

Press X (PS4Controller), A(Xbox Controller), Q(Keyboard), M(Keyboard) to join as a player. Player 1 must press the same key to continue.
